post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get current JWT token information including expiration time
Get all tokens created by the current user

post.description: Create a new JWT token with custom expiration

delete.description: Delete a token by ID (only if it belongs to the current user)

get.description: Retrieve all CDN lines, optionally filtered by provider ID

post.description: Create a new CDN line with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a CDN line by its ID

put.description: Update an existing CDN line by its ID

delete.description: Delete a CDN line by its ID. This will also delete associated video stream endpoints.

post.description: Create a new CDN provider with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a CDN provider by its ID

put.description: Update an existing CDN provider by its ID

delete.description: Delete a CDN provider by its ID. This will also delete associated CDN lines and video stream endpoints.

get.description: Retrieve all CDN lines associated with a specific provider

post.description: Create a new domain with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a domain by its ID

put.description: Update an existing domain by its ID

delete.description: Delete a domain by its ID. This will also delete associated video stream endpoints.

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive system statistics including counts of providers, lines, domains, streams, stream paths, endpoints, and various aggregations

200.description: Statistics object containing counts and aggregations

get.description: Retrieve all stream paths, optionally filtered by stream ID

post.description: Create a new stream path with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a stream path by its ID

put.description: Update an existing stream path by its ID

delete.description: Delete a stream path by its ID. This will also delete associated video stream endpoints.

post.description: Create a new stream with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a stream by its ID

put.description: Update an existing stream by its ID

delete.description: Delete a stream by its ID. This will also delete associated stream paths and video stream endpoints.

get.description: Retrieve all video stream endpoints, optionally filtered by line_id, domain_id, stream_id, provider_id, status, or table_id

post.description: Create a new video stream endpoint with the provided information
post.summary: Create a new video stream endpoint

post.description: Automatically generate all video stream endpoints based on all combinations of CDN lines, domains, and stream paths. This will delete all existing endpoints and regenerate them.

get.description: Retrieve a video stream endpoint by its ID
get.summary: Get video stream endpoint by ID

put.description: Update an existing video stream endpoint by its ID

delete.description: Delete a video stream endpoint by its ID

patch.description: Update the status (enabled/disabled) of a video stream endpoint

provider_id.description: Optional: NULL means match all providers

expires_in.description: Expiration time in seconds (ignored if never_expire is true)

provider_id.description: Optional: NULL means match all providers

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
